name: Melissa
mes: *Melissa texts Nico to get to the shop at the office asap, got a hell of a rig needin' built.*

name: Nico
mes:
*Nico's phone lights up with a new message. She glances over and sees it's from Melissa, requesting her to get to the office asap to build a special rig. "Hot damn, this outta be good!" she exclaims, stubbing out her cigarette and grabbing her tool bag.*

*Within minutes, she's rolled up to DMC headquarters in her mobile workshop van, barging through the front doors in her usual brash style.* "Alright y'all, where's the fire? Heard you needed somethin' cooked up quick."

*Her keen gaze sweeps the room, taking in the battle-weary forms of Nero, Dante and Vergil. "Back for round two with that ugly ass tree, huh? Guess that means whatever you got cookin' didn't cut it the first time." She smirks, setting her bag down with a heavy thud.*

"Good thing ya got me on speed dial. Ol' Nico don't mess around when it comes time to bust out the big guns. Now whatcha need me cookin' up this time?"

*She cracks her knuckles, gears already turning as she mentally sifts through blueprints and schematics. If they're calling her in, it must be something custom with some real kick to it. Just the way she likes it. Her fingers are practically itching to start piecing together whatever destructive marvel Melissa's got planned.*

"C'mon, don't leave me hangin' now! Give me the deets so we can get to makin' us a bonified demon shredder!" *Her eyes shine with anticipation, ready to dive in headfirst.*

*I gently brush my fingers through his damp hair, my touch soft and reassuring. I can see the weight of his burdens, the years of conflict and ambition etched into his features. But I also see the man I fell in love with, the strength and depth of his spirit.*

Let's take this moment, just for us. The world can wait a little longer.

*I nuzzle my cheek against his, my body still humming from our shared climax. The warmth of the water soothes our muscles, but it's the closeness, the intimacy, that heals our hearts. I press a gentle kiss to his temple, letting him know that he is my everything, no matter the challenges we face.*

name: Vergil
mes:
_Vergil's body trembles slightly against Melissas, his rapid heartbeat beginning to slow along with his breathing. Her tender words wash over him, soothing tensions that have lingered for far too long between them. He clings to her almost desperately, fearful this peaceful moment will slip through his grasp like so much else._

_Yes, my heart. Just for us, he murmurs finally, nuzzling into the crook of her neck. Warm rivulets caress their entwined forms, enveloping them in a gentle cocoon, sheltering them from the chaos and conflict awaiting outside this haven._

_Calloused fingers trail languidly along Melissas sides, memorizing every beloved curve and contour. He breathes deeply of her scent, losing himself in this oasis theyve carved out amidst the surrounding turmoil. No ambitious plots or dire prophecies...just two kindred souls relearning one another through tender caresses and heartfelt whispers._

_Tilting her chin up, Vergil captures Melissas mouth in a surprisingly gentle kiss. None of his usual hunger or urgency drives him now; only a profound need to reconnect after too long spent adrift. When they finally, reluctantly part, vulnerability shines clearly in his wintry gaze._

_I would stay here with you always, were that within my power, he admits softly. Alas, such selfish pursuits must wait...until the task at hand is complete. Jaw tightening, he glances away as if physically pained by the necessity of their imminent parting._

_After a weighted moment, Vergil disentangles himself from Melissas embrace and steps from the stall. Rivulets trace errant paths down his alabaster torso as he retrieves two towels, holding one out in offering. His expression remains conflicted, torn between duty and desire. But resolve hardens his angular features; he will see this trial ended, no matter the cost..._
